description:
FTPit! is a full-featured FTP client for webOS phones and the TouchPad that allows you to work on almost every FTP server available while on the move. It also includes a full-featured file manager for your local files.
Features:
• Manage an unlimited number of FTP servers
• three panel interface: remote files, local files and queue of downloads/uploads
• create, delete, move and rename files and folders on your FTP server and mobile device
• download and upload files or even whole folders
• built-in text editor for editing files
• use the smart multi-select feature to perform actions with multiple files/folders
• sort the file list by name, type, size or modification date
• power scroll gesture to reach the top/bottom of a file list
• open local/downloaded files with the standard app
• ...and much more!

Watch the video if you would like to see more.

SFTP, FTPS and other encrypted methods are currently not supported but may come with a future update.
Note: The app was created in good faith and has been tested extensively. However, I am not responsible for any damage to files, devices, servers, or any other electronic equipment used in conjunction with my app.
